articles.author: Alex Scarborough
articles.title: Former Mississippi State LB Aaron Brule to transfer to Michigan State - ESPN Australia
articles.description: Former Mississippi State linebacker Aaron Brule is the latest player to join Mel Tucker's Michigan State program via the transfer portal.
articles.content:
Michigan State coach Mel Tucker is making use of the transfer portal once again.
On Thursday, Tucker and the Spartans gained the commitment of former Mississippi State linebacker Aaron Brule.
